RT @MLBStats The @Astros have matched their franchise-best record through 110 games in a season (70-40) …
 
The only other time they did that, they won the #WorldSeries. http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/EA7n-H6WkAE0du6.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/EA7n-H6WkAE0du6.mp4

Socialism has been a manifest disaster, an absolute failure all over the face of the globe. Socialism has been responsible for suffering, and misery, and poverty, and death of billions across the planet earth: https://www.tedcruz.org/news/daily-wire-ted-cruz-rails-against-socialism-the-rafts-are-all-going-one-direction/

Some are agitating for the UN to get back involved in Guatemala through CICIG. This is wrong! Guatemala is a partner and friend of our nation. Their sovereignty needs to be respected, and US taxpayers shouldn’t be stuck with yet another UN bill.

RT @averyjaffe Democrats will win this seat and if @WillHurd doesn’t believe he can keep his job in a changing Texas, his colleagues must be having second thoughts too.

Our @dccc statement on #TX23 is here: https://dccc.org/dccc-statement-vulnerable-rep-will-hurds-retirement/

RT @YoBenCohen .@BernieSanders is the best candidate to beat Trump and drive the transformational change that we need to create a country that works for working families. So Jerry + I are cranking up the old ice cream machine to show our support. Sign up 2 win a pint at http://www.JusticeInAllItsFlavors.com http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EA9h4GTXoAAUQQj.jpg

The Restoring Resilient Reefs Act will ensure federal agencies are partnering effectively with state & local governments. Thanks to @brianschatz, @SenRickScott, @maziehirono, @RepJenniffer & @RepDarrenSoto for joining me in this important effort.

https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=78CBD372-4BE3-4869-8E51-553709C01F7A

I saw the devastated condition of our coral reefs firsthand when touring the Florida Keys in February, & I promised a comprehensive response. This bipartisan, bicameral legislation is critical to restoring & conserving our coral reefs.

Read more ⬇️
https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=78CBD372-4BE3-4869-8E51-553709C01F7A

Grateful for the warm welcome at last night's town hall in Tempe, Arizona! I’ve been to 25 states and Puerto Rico (and counting!) since launching my campaign, because I’m running to be president of all the United States. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EA-AeahWsAEiecj.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EA-AeaiW4AMjE3i.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EA-AeayXYAIIj4x.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EA-AeamXUAAwqPz.jpg

This is what sea level rise looks like.

Those who argue that a #GreenNewDeal is too ambitious don’t see that glacial melt isn’t waiting - in fact, it’s happening at a much faster rate than predicted.

We don’t have time to argue. We need to act - on a massive scale. 🌎 https://twitter.com/laurie_garrett/status/1157015875276464129 QT @Laurie_Garrett This is a roaring glacial melt, under the bridge to Kangerlussiauq,  Greenland  where it's 22C today and Danish officials say 12 billions tons of ice melted in 24 hours, yesterday. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1157015156381143042/pu/img/aOpfcWTosWE-16qq.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1157015156381143042/pu/vid/320x568/oW26U-Qfww7EA-fG.mp4?tag=10

The pharmaceutical industry will claim the outrageous prices they charge for life-saving medicines are necessary. 
 
Maybe they haven’t heard of a country that we share thousands of miles of a border with, where they sell the exact same drugs for a fraction of the price. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EA98uUGWwAAue88.jpg

Instead of sending men to Mars we should send oxygen producing organic life  modified to grow under the harsh conditions on Mars. Creating livable atmosphere should be our first goal. 
 https://gizmodo.com/humans-will-never-colonize-mars-1836316222

To the folks outraged at the academics + experts naming our concentration camp system what it is, what else do you call camps where parents die as their children watch?

Discomfort at the truth should spur us to change it. Denial prioritizes our comfort over people’s lives ⬇️ https://twitter.com/raicestexas/status/1157072286878273536 QT @RAICESTEXAS Marvin, a 32 yr old man from El Salvador, died in front of his 8 yr old daughter this morning in a CBP detention center.

The mother of their child is not yet reunited w/her grieving daughter. 

This is the 8th death in CBP custody in 9 months.

RIP, Marvin,

Via - @angelcanales http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EA6_HDnUwAAU8R5.jpg

I say to Mitch McConnell: Do not ignore the will of 200 million Americans who want us to put an end to starvation wages in the United States.

Let the American people have a vote on a $15 minimum wage! https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2019/07/30/two-thirds-of-americans-favor-raising-federal-minimum-wage-to-15-an-hour/

For years I've raised the case of Chinese human rights activist Huang Qi. Huang Qi has long been targeted by the Chinese gov't & this week he was unjustly sentenced to serve 12-years in prison.

Watch my '17 floor speech. It is time to release him now--> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=toTPAEOMeCU&feature=youtu.be

I know a thing or two about the greed of the health care industry. RT @shannonrwatts BREAKING: Three @NRA board members just resigned saying that they lost their committee assignments after raising questions about certain spending by CEO Wayne LaPierre.  https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/three-nra-board-members-resign-in-latest-sign-of-upheaval-at-gun-rights-group/2019/08/01/aad49bc0-b49d-11e9-8f6c-7828e68cb15f_story.html

I'm proud to reintroduce the SAVES Act to eliminate bureaucratic regulations & empower Texans to engage in a sustainable use of resources while supporting their wildlife breeding & conservation efforts.

We're not going to solve the urgent problems our country faces with small ideas and spinelessness. We're going to solve them with big, structural change.

I know what's broken in this country, I know how to fix it, and I will build a movement to make it happen.

Alicia, Christopher & George survived the deadliest mass shooting in modern history. 

They just survived another. 

This isn't the first time gun violence survivors have lived through multiple shootings.

Unless we elect a president with the courage to act, it won’t be the last. https://twitter.com/CNN/status/1156800278328483841 QT @CNN Two brothers visited Las Vegas and survived the deadliest mass shooting in modern US history. Two years later, they were attending the Gilroy Garlic Festival when a gunman opened fire. https://trib.al/DHIsBX5

Withdrawing from the INF Treaty won't make us or our European allies safer. We should be holding Russia accountable for its violations – not torching the treaty that has prevented a dangerous arms race for over 30 years. https://www.cnn.com/2019/08/02/politics/nuclear-treaty-inf-us-withdraws-russia/index.html

This administration has repeatedly tried to strip away protections for Americans with pre-existing conditions, and their latest attempt to sell junk health care plans is no different. Enough. We've introduced a resolution to save protections for pre-existing conditions.

#Florida’s coral reefs,are an integral part of the economic & ecological character of our state,are in trouble.

Our bipartisan Restoring Resilient Reefs Act will increase monitoring procedures for restoration efforts & speed up emergency funds.

#Sayfie

I say to McConnell: Stop being a coward. If you want to vote against a $15 minimum wage, so be it. But don't continue to deny a Senate vote on my bill to raise the minimum wage to a living wage of $15/hour when that is exactly what 67% of Americans demand. https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2019/07/30/two-thirds-of-americans-favor-raising-federal-minimum-wage-to-15-an-hour/

Officer Pantaleo should be fired. Eric Garner's family has waited too long for justice—we need more civilian oversight to hold police accountable when they fail. https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1157322901655363584 QT @NPR JUST IN: A judge finds that NYPD Officer Daniel Pantaleo used an illegal chokehold on Eric Garner and recommends that he be fired.

The city’s police commissioner will make the final decision on Pantaleo, who has been working a desk job since Garner’s death 5 years ago.

Californians: wildfire season is seemingly year-round now, and it's critical that everyone is informed and prepared. Check out this helpful tracker and remember to always heed tips and warnings from local officials in your area. https://projects.sfchronicle.com/trackers/california-fire-map/

Here's my message to the Walton family: End your greed. Pay everyone at Walmart a living wage of $15 an hour. https://twitter.com/forrespect/status/1156983088355979264 QT @forrespect Walmart workers are paid poverty wages while the Walton family is worth over $170 billion.

We showed up at the shareholders meeting with Senator @BernieSanders to send a message to the Walton family: 

Pay us a living wage & give hourly workers a seat on the corporate board. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1156982570833317890/pu/img/jEMvsOpaO88fYnij.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1156982570833317890/pu/vid/480x270/CyeVNQxOB75ZpFbU.mp4?tag=10

The Trump administration made the right decision when they announced the United States was withdrawing from the INF Treaty w Russia, and I applaud the administration for implementing that decision.

My colleagues and I wrote VA Secretary Wilkie demanding he end the destructive, anti-union negotiation tactics being carried out by his department.

We must support our unionized workers, not ignore their demands—power belongs to the people.

The #DemDebate was a gazillion times more fun with family in the audience! I’m grateful that my nephew Mark, his wife Melinda, and the kids came to Detroit from Oklahoma City to cheer me on. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EA_pTcQX4AUgb1p.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1157398729240076288/vid/480x270/ErX9_eum0bSBkQLK.mp4?tag=13

We need someone in the Oval Office who doesn’t tear places down but builds people up—that’s the kind of leader I’ve been my whole life, and that's the leadership I’ll bring with me to the White House.

Detroit—thank you for inspiring me this week. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1157415853140430849/img/9JxIDVE4fBUk8W8A.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1157415853140430849/vid/320x320/tbiEIRfEmNU9zPRV.mp4?tag=13

It’s time we call what is happening to our planet what it is: a crisis. We’re experiencing a climate crisis. And we must act now. 
https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2019/jul/31/climate-crisis-change-language

Parents should not have to sell their house or declare bankruptcy to keep their child alive.

Under Medicare for All, if your child is sick, you don't have to worry if you can afford for them to see a pediatrician. They will get the care they need, regardless of your income.

This is outrageous: the Senate began a five-week recess yesterday without Republicans allowing a single vote on legislation to secure and strengthen our election infrastructure. Major elections begin this fall—we must take action immediately.

RT @briebriejoy Every minute of this video is amazing. I'm so glad that @DrDooleyMD is on our team. She makes an incredibly compelling case that there's no substitute for #Medicare4All. https://twitter.com/BernieSanders/status/1157395930116689925 QT @BernieSanders Listen to @DrDooleyMD. Patients don't "love" their costly health insurance plans. They need Medicare for All now. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EA6f5QuX4Aoi2ow.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1157036986458419200/vid/320x320/a8R4PY7imKD-NoZS.mp4?tag=13

The Puerto Rican people came together, stood up, and forced Governor Rosselló to resign. They showed us what ordinary people can achieve when we organize. Our job now is to make sure they get fair and responsive representation. Puerto Rico deserves democracy, not austerity. https://twitter.com/NBCNews/status/1157401130919444481 QT @NBCNews WATCH: Puerto Ricans in Old San Juan celebrate the moment Gov. Rosselló's resignation becomes official. https://www.nbcnews.com/news/latino/lawmakers-may-be-closer-determining-puerto-rico-governor-s-successor-n1038771 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EA_qMPeXUAA6rZH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1157400961033351168/vid/480x270/jFurOHx7uKXFF6tn.mp4?tag=13

El pueblo boricua se unió, se levantó, y le forzó a Rosselló a renunciar. Nos muestra lo que la gente común puede lograr cuando nos organizamos. Ahora tenemos que asegurar de que reciban una representación justa y receptiva. Puerto Rico se merece la democracia, no la austeridad.

Felicidades al pueblo de Puerto Rico por movilizarse con éxito y exigir cambio. Después de décadas de declive económico e incremento en los indices de pobreza, el gobierno de Puerto Rico debe responder a las necesidades de la clase trabajadora y no a la avaricia de Wall Street.

Congratulations to the people of Puerto Rico for successfully mobilizing and demanding change. After decades of economic decline and increased poverty, the government of Puerto Rico must respond to the needs of working families and not the greed of Wall Street. https://twitter.com/norahodonnell/status/1157419839826419713 QT @NorahODonnell #BREAKING: Crowds have gathered outside the governor’s mansion in Puerto Rico, where Ricardo Rosello has just stepped down. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1157419812798308359/img/BYtSVe8f-t_w2-jn.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1157419812798308359/vid/480x270/9b73Aij-8KUJRh35.mp4?tag=13

- Ending needless war & curbing exploding military spending
